Who Was Epigamia CEO Rohan Mirchandani, Who Died Of Cardiac Arrest At 41 - NDTV
summary:
Remembering Rohan Mirchandani, CEO of Epigamia Who Passed Away at 41

Date: December 21, 2024 — Source: NDTV

Rohan Mirchandani, co-founder of Epigamia, died suddenly from a cardiac arrest at the age of 41. He was instrumental in establishing Epigamia as India's leading Greek yoghurt brand.

  • Mirchandani co-founded Drums Food International in 2013.
  • He greatly impacted the healthy food market through his work with Epigamia, which includes a range of yogurt and dairy products.
  • His vision was to grow the company’s revenue to ₹250 crore this fiscal year.
  • Rohan was highly educated, holding degrees from renowned institutions like NYU and Wharton.
  • He planned to expand into the Middle East market by 2025-26.
“All of us at the Epigamia family will deeply mourn this loss. Rohan was our mentor, friend, and leader.” - Epigamia Leadership Team

This loss is a significant moment for the Epigamia team and all those who knew Rohan Mirchandani. His legacy is solidified in the company’s achievements and the lives he touched.
newTitle: Remembering Rohan Mirchandani, CEO of Epigamia Who Passed Away at 41

title: ‘Don't Mess With Us’: Ex-Mossad Agents Make Sensational On-Air Revelation About Hezbollah Pager Plot - News18
summary:
‘Don't Mess With Us’: Ex-Mossad Agents Make Sensational On-Air Revelation About Hezbollah Pager Plot

Date: December 23, 2024 Source: CBS News

This article reveals the covert operation conducted by Israeli spy agency Mossad to create and activate explosives disguised as pagers, targeting Hezbollah militants.

  • The operation led to pager blasts in Lebanon in September 2024, killing several Hezbollah members and injuring around 3,000 people.
  • Two ex-Mossad agents provided insights into how they deceived Hezbollah into using explosives created by Israel.
  • Mossad set up shell companies to manufacture and sell the devices without Hezbollah's knowledge.
  • The blasts aimed not to kill but to incapacitate militants, creating fear and demonstrating superiority over Hezbollah.
CBS 60 minutes interviewed two recently retired senior (alleged) Mossad agents with leading roles in the “pager and walkie-talkie” operation which decimated Hezbollah. Watch this fascinating interview! pic.twitter.com/SuxNUdqWX1

This operation represents one of the most notable and daring counterintelligence strategies in history.
newTitle: Ex-Mossad Agents Reveal Hezbollah Pager Plot Operations

title: Sunny Leone gets monthly grant under Chhattisgarh govt scheme. But there's a twist - Hindustan Times
summary:
Sunny Leone gets monthly grant under Chhattisgarh govt scheme. But there's a twist

Date: Dec 23, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

A man in Chhattisgarh has fraudulently opened an account in the name of actress Sunny Leone to illegally receive monthly government grants designated for women.

  • The Chhattisgarh government provides ₹1,000 every month to married women through the 'Mahtari Vandan Yojana'.
  • Virendra Joshi allegedly opened the account under Sunny Leone's name and has been receiving money illegally.
  • Authorities are investigating the case and have frozen the fraudulent account.
  • The discovery has led to political tensions between the BJP and Congress parties regarding the effectiveness of the scheme.
Deepak Baij of Congress claims that over 50% of beneficiaries of the Mahtari Vandan Yojana are fake.

This incident highlights issues of fraud and portrayal of social welfare programs while raising questions about beneficiary verification processes.
newTitle: Sunny Leone receives funds under a grant scheme due to an fraudulent account setup

title: Novel solution for tackling pest menace in hostels | - UoH Herald
Constipation Awareness Month 2024: 10 Changes Everyone Can Make To Their Diet For Better Digestion - NDTV
summary:
Constipation Awareness Month 2024: 10 Changes Everyone Can Make To Their Diet For Better Digestion

Published on: April 2, 2024 by NDTV

December is recognized as Constipation Awareness Month, focusing on educating the public about constipation, its causes, and prevention methods. Chronic constipation can lead to serious complications, and dietary changes play a key role in managing this condition.

  • Increase fibre intake with soluble and insoluble sources.
  • Stay hydrated by drinking at least eight glasses of water daily.
  • Incorporate probiotics through foods like yogurt and fermented vegetables.
  • Limit processed foods to enhance digestive efficiency.
  • Eat regular, balanced meals to support digestive health.
  • Chew food thoroughly to aid in digestion.
  • Avoid excessive caffeine and alcohol to prevent dehydration.
  • Incorporate healthy fats for better nutrient absorption.
  • Include natural laxative foods like kiwis and prunes.
  • Practice mindful eating for improved digestion.
“Implementing these dietary changes can lead to significant improvements in digestive health, reducing the incidence of constipation and enhancing overall well-being.”

It's vital to introduce these changes gradually and consult healthcare professionals for personalized advice.
newTitle: Constipation Awareness Month 2024: Dietary Changes for Better Digestion

Steering, Throttle Fault May Be Behind Mumbai Ferry Crash, Crew Knew: Sources - NDTV
summary:
Steering, Throttle Fault May Be Behind Mumbai Ferry Crash, Crew Knew: Sources

Published on December 18, Source: Mumbai News

The recent collision between a Navy boat and a passenger ferry in Mumbai resulted in tragic losses, likely due to technical issues with the naval vessel.

  • The incident occurred on December 18, resulting in 15 deaths.
  • A technical malfunction in the steering assembly and throttle quadrant is believed to be the cause.
  • The Navy boat was reportedly speeding and lost control before the collision.
  • The ferry was carrying over 100 passengers and sank in the Arabian Sea.
  • Of the 113 people on both vessels, 15 perished, and 98 were rescued.
  • The ferry was overloaded, surpassing its licensed passenger capacity.
  • The Maharashtra Maritime Board has initiated an investigation and cancelled the ferry's license.
“The crew was aware of the malfunction when the collision took place.” - Survivor from the Navy vessel

The tragedy highlights significant safety concerns in maritime operations and calls for a thorough investigation into the events leading to the accident.
newTitle: Technical Malfunction Likely Caused Mumbai Ferry Tragedy, According to Sources

title: Chandrababu Naidu & Revanth Reddy: A Meeting in Davos? - Gulte
summary:
Chandrababu Naidu & Revanth Reddy: A Meeting in Davos?

Published on: 12:06 pm, 23 December 2024

The chief ministers of the Telugu states, Chandrababu Naidu and Revanth Reddy, are set to attend the upcoming World Economic Forum Summit in Davos, which begins on January 20. While this may be an opportunity for them to meet, their attendance will be in an individual capacity rather than a bilateral meeting.

  • Both leaders have previously met to discuss post-bifurcation issues.
  • This will be Naidu’s first trip to Davos during his second tenure as a chief minister.
  • Revanth Reddy continues the tradition of attending the summit.
  • Maharashtra's chief minister Devendra Fadnavis will also be at Davos.
“It has to be seen if they will orchestrate a meeting here to discuss political affairs of Telugu states.”

The upcoming summit presents a significant platform for political discussions among the Telugu CMs, which could influence the region's governance.

WhatsApp to end support for older Android phones from January 1, 2025: Full list here - The Financial Express
summary:
WhatsApp to End Support for Older Android Phones Starting January 1, 2025

Publication Date: Not specified; Source: Financial Express

In a significant move, Meta announced that WhatsApp will cease to support older Android devices beginning January 1, 2025. Users operating on Android KitKat and older versions will be unable to run the app, impacting millions globally.

Key Points

  • WhatsApp support will end for all Android devices running KitKat or older.
  • Users are encouraged to back up their data to newer devices.
  • Affected brands include Samsung, Motorola, HTC, LG, and Sony.
  • Meta previously announced similar plans for older iPhones.
  • Important backup tips provided to help users transition smoothly.

"If you are still using one of these devices as your daily driver, the logical way forward is to back up all your WhatsApp data to a newer device."

As WhatsApp phases out support for older systems, users must take proactive measures to move their data to updated devices to avoid losing access to their chat histories.
newTitle: WhatsApp to End Support for Older Android Phones Starting January 1, 2025

India Cements soars 11% as UltraTech Cement’s stake buyout gets CCI nod - Upstox
summary:
India Cements soars 11% as UltraTech Cement’s stake buyout gets CCI nod

Date: December 20, 2023 | Source: The Economic Times

Shares of India Cements surged 11% in early trade on Monday after the Competition Commission of India (CCI) approved UltraTech Cement Ltd’s controlling stake in The India Cements Ltd.

Under the approved deal, UltraTech Cement will acquire a 32.72% stake in India Cements from its promoters and members of the promoter group, as well as from Sri Saradha Logistics Private Limited. UltraTech will make an open offer to acquire up to 26 percent more of the paid-up equity share capital of India Cements, taking its total potential shareholding to nearly 59%.

  • CCI approved UltraTech Cement’s acquisition of 32.72% stake in India Cements.
  • UltraTech will also make an open offer to acquire an additional 26% stake.
  • The transaction aims to provide UltraTech majority control over India Cements.
  • India Cements stock was trading at ₹365.00, up 7.62% from Friday's close.
“The Proposed Combination envisages UltraTech Cement Limited’s acquisition of 32.72% of the paid-up equity share capital of The India Cements Limited.”

This acquisition reflects UltraTech's strategic move to strengthen its position in the Indian cement market.
newTitle: India Cements soars 11% as UltraTech Cement’s stake buyout gets CCI nod

title: Which Continent Is 90% Covered By Ice? - Jagran Josh
summary:
Which Continent Is 90% Covered By Ice?

Date: 23, Dec 2024

Source: jagranjosh.com

Antarctica, the coldest continent on Earth, is covered by ice that constitutes about 90% of its land area, playing a vital role in global climate regulation.

  • Antarctica contains over 90% of its landmass under thick ice.
  • It holds approximately 60% of the world's fresh water.
  • Temperatures in Antarctica can drop below -60°C (-76°F).
  • No permanent human settlements exist; only temporary research stations.
  • Antarctica’s glaciers are critical for global sea levels.
  • Diverse wildlife such as penguins and seals are adapted to the harsh conditions.
  • Home to international research stations studying climate change and other scientific fields.
"Antarctica is crucial for understanding Earth's climate and ecosystems."

This article emphasizes Antarctica's significance in global climate systems and the extreme conditions that define its environment.
newTitle: Which Continent Is 90% Covered By Ice?

title: 5 Unique methods astronauts use to maintain hygiene at International Space Station - India.com
summary:
5 Unique Methods Astronauts Use to Maintain Hygiene at the International Space Station

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: India.com

Astronauts on the International Space Station (ISS) face unique challenges when it comes to hygiene due to the lack of traditional bathing facilities. Here are five creative methods they use to stay clean while orbiting the Earth.

  • Astronauts brush their teeth with minimal water and wipe off excess toothpaste.
  • They use no-rinse shampoo for their hair, rubbing it in and towel-drying it without rinsing.
  • No-rinse body wipes replace baths for personal cleaning.
  • Instead of washing clothes, they wear disposable ones which are thrown away after use.
  • The crew regularly disinfects surfaces in the spacecraft to prevent bacteria build-up.
They routinely wipe down the spacecraft’s surfaces with disinfectant wipes and vacuum-cleaner-like devices to prevent bacteria from building up.

Maintaining hygiene in space is crucial for health and wellbeing, showcasing the innovative adaptations required for life beyond Earth.
newTitle: 5 Unique Methods Astronauts Use to Maintain Hygiene at the International Space Station

title: 3 Marriages, Rs 1.25 Crore: How 'Looteri Dulhan' Targeted Rich Men - NDTV
summary:
3 Marriages, Rs 1.25 Crore: How 'Looteri Dulhan' Targeted Rich Men

Date: December 24, 2024 | Source: NDTV

A woman has been arrested over a decade after marrying a series of men and extracting over ₹ 1.25 crore from them under the pretext of settlements.

  • Seema, also known as Nikki, first married a businessman from Agra in 2013 and received ₹ 75 lakh after filing a case against his family.
  • In 2017, she married a software engineer from Gurugram, taking an additional ₹ 10 lakh after their separation.
  • Her latest marriage was to a businessman from Jaipur in 2023, from whom she fled with cash and jewellery worth ₹ 36 lakh.
“Police investigation revealed that Seema sought her victims on matrimonial sites, focusing on men who were divorced or widowed.”

This case highlights the alarming trend of individuals exploiting matrimonial platforms for financial gain.
newTitle: How 'Looteri Dulhan' Deceived Wealthy Men Across Multiple Marriages

"Working Longer Is...": Congress MP On Narayana Murthy's 70-Hour Workweek - NDTV
summary:
Congress MP Critiques Narayana Murthy's 70-Hour Workweek Advocacy

Published on: December 23, 2024 | Source: NDTV

Congress MP Karti P Chidambaram has criticized Infosys co-founder Narayana Murthy's comments advocating for a longer workweek, emphasizing the importance of work-life balance and efficiency over lengthy hours.

  • Murthy expresses disappointment over India's transition from a six-day to a five-day workweek.
  • He advocates for a 70-hour workweek, linking hard work to national development.
  • Chidambaram counters that emphasis should be placed on efficiency, not longer hours.
  • He proposes a 4-day workweek, from Monday noon to Friday 2 PM.
  • Both Chidambaram and another Congress MP, Gaurav Gogoi, disagree with Murthy's perspective on work-life balance.
“Daily life is as it is a struggle, battling inefficient and substandard infrastructure and amenities. Work-life balance is most important for good social order and harmony.” - Karti P Chidambaram

In conclusion, the debate over work hours highlights differing views on work-life balance and the approach to productivity in India’s rapidly evolving work culture.
newTitle: Congress MP Critiques Narayana Murthy's 70-Hour Workweek Advocacy

title: Zomato share price declines as it joins 30-share SENSEX; Here's how all constituents are performing - Upstox
summary:
Zomato Share Price Declines as it Joins 30-Share SENSEX

Date: December 23, 2024

Source: Upstox

Zomato’s shares fell on its debut on the SENSEX index, experiencing a decline as it replaced JSW Steel in the index. Despite this, the company has shown substantial growth over the past year.

  • Zomato's share price dropped 3% to ₹273.15 and closed down 0.37% at ₹280.80.
  • The stock has risen 38% in six months and 124.79% year-to-date.
  • In Q2 FY25, Zomato reported a 388.8% increase in consolidated profit after tax to ₹176 crore.
  • Revenue from operations increased by 68.5% to ₹4,799 crore.
  • The broader SENSEX was up 779 points, driven by major players like HDFC Bank and Reliance.
“Investors should note that past performance is not an indicator of future returns.”

In conclusion, while Zomato’s entry into SENSEX was marked by an initial decline in stock price, the company shows significant growth potential based on its recent financial performance.
newTitle: Zomato Share Price Declines upon Joining SENSEX

title: Fact Check: Can bamboo layer and coconut oil make vitiligo disappear in a few days? - Medical Dialogues
summary:
Can Bamboo Layer and Coconut Oil Make Vitiligo Disappear in a Few Days?

Publication Date: [Insert Date]   Source: Medical Dialogues

The article discusses a claim circulating on Instagram that a mixture of bamboo powder and coconut oil can cure vitiligo in just a few days. This claim is identified as false, with evidence showing that while bamboo and coconut oil may have some benefits for skin health, they do not cure vitiligo.

Key Points:

  • The claim that bamboo powder mixed with coconut oil can cure vitiligo is false.
  • Proper diagnosis and treatment are essential for vitiligo management.
  • Dr. Shireen Furtado explains evidence-based treatment options like topical corticosteroids and phototherapy.
  • No scientific evidence supports the use of bamboo powder for treating vitiligo.
  • Vitiligo is a complex condition that requires medical oversight.
Dr. Shireen Furtado: "No, such remedies are not scientifically proven to cure vitiligo. Effective treatments require time and medical guidance."

The conclusion emphasizes the importance of consulting healthcare professionals for effective vitiligo treatments, as unverified remedies can be harmful.
newTitle: Can Bamboo and Coconut Oil Cure Vitiligo? A Fact Check

WhatsApp will discontinue support for over 20 older Android smartphones starting January 1, 2024, which primarily affects devices running Android KitKat or older. Users are advised to back up their chats to ensure data preservation.

  • Over 20 Android devices will lose access to WhatsApp from January 1, 2024.

title: Grenade attack in Gurdaspur: Three Khalistan Zindabad Force members gunned down in encounter in Pilibhit - The Hindu
summary:
Grenade Attack in Gurdaspur: Encounter in Pilibhit Claims Lives of Three Khalistan Zindabad Force Suspects

Date: December 23, 2024 | Source: The Hindu

Three terror suspects linked to a grenade attack in Gurdaspur were killed in a police encounter in Pilibhit, considered a significant victory against the Khalistan Zindabad Force.

  • Suspects identified as Gurvinder Singh, Virender Singh, and Jaspreet Singh, all from Gurdaspur, Punjab.
  • The encounter occurred in Puranpur, Uttar Pradesh, early on December 23, 2024.
  • Weapons seized included two AK-47 rifles and two Glock pistols along with ammunition.
  • Punjab's Director General of Police highlighted this as a major breakthrough against the terror module.
  • All three suspects succumbed to injuries sustained in the encounter.
  • Investigation into their terror connections is ongoing.
“In a major breakthrough against a Pak-sponsored Khalistan Zindabad Force terror module, a joint operation led to an encounter with three module members.” – Gaurav Yadav, Punjab DGP

This encounter marks a significant step in tackling terror activities associated with the Khalistan Zindabad Force in the region, furthering efforts to ensure public safety.
newTitle: Grenade Attack in Gurdaspur: Encounter in Pilibhit Claims Lives of Three Khalistan Zindabad Force Suspects

title: Can homemade juice cause blood sugar spikes in diabetic patients? - Asianet Newsable
summary:
Can Homemade Juice Spike Blood Sugar in Diabetics?

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Asianet Newsable

This article discusses the potential risks of homemade juice for diabetic patients, emphasizing that it can lead to significant blood sugar spikes.

  • Diabetics should avoid all types of juice, both homemade and store-bought, due to high glucose content.
  • Juicing fruits concentrates natural sugars, which can rapidly increase blood sugar levels.
  • Whole fruits contain fiber that helps regulate blood sugar; juice lacks this fiber, causing quicker absorption of sugar.
  • Juice empties the stomach faster than whole fruits, leading to increased hunger and more frequent eating.
  • Juicing reduces essential nutrients, such as fiber, vitamins, and minerals, making juice less nutritious.
  • Choosing whole fruits over juice is recommended for better blood sugar balance and sustained energy.
“Diabetics should choose whole fruits over juice for fiber and nutrients, balancing blood sugar and providing sustained energy.”

In conclusion, while homemade juice may seem healthy, it poses risks for diabetics and is often less nutritious than whole fruits.
newTitle: Can Homemade Juice Spike Blood Sugar in Diabetics?

Indian Stock Market: Sensex zooms 800 points, Nifty above 23,800 as HDFC Bank, RIL lead recovery - The Economic Times
summary:
Sensex zooms 800 points, Nifty above 23,800 as HDFC Bank, RIL lead recovery

Publication Date: Recent

Source: Economic Times

The Indian stock market saw a significant uptrend with the Sensex gaining 800 points driven by strong performances from financial and IT stocks, influenced by favorable US inflation data.

  • Sensex rose by 800 points (1.02%) to 78,883.37.
  • Nifty 50 increased by 225.50 points (0.96%) to 23,801.70.
  • Market capitalization of BSE-listed companies increased by Rs 1.27 lakh crore.
  • HDFC Bank and Reliance Industries led gains in the market, up 1.7% and 1.1% respectively.
  • Financial stocks were the biggest contributors to the market rise.
  • Indian Oil Corp saw its shares increase by 1.3% due to a new investment in Odisha.
  • India Cements shares surged 11% after receiving approval for a significant acquisition.
  • Foreign institutions sold a substantial amount of equities while domestic investors were net buyers.
“Concerns over India's slowing growth and a weakening rupee persist, making markets less attractive to foreign investors.” - Prashanth Tapse, Senior VP (Research) at Mehta Equities.

In conclusion, the market is experiencing a temporary relief rally following recent sell-offs, but ongoing economic concerns remain.
newTitle: Sensex Gains 800 Points, Nifty Surpasses 23,800 Amid Strong Financials

title: Trump appoints Indian American entrepreneur Sriram Krishnan as senior policy advisor on Artificial Intelligence - The Hindu
summary:
Trump Appoints Sriram Krishnan as Senior Policy Advisor on AI

Publication Date: December 23, 2024

Source: The Hindu

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump has appointed Indian American entrepreneur Sriram Krishnan as Senior White House Policy Advisor on Artificial Intelligence.

  • Sriram Krishnan previously worked at Microsoft, Twitter, Yahoo!, Facebook, and Snap.
  • He will collaborate with David O. Sacks, the White House AI & Crypto Czar.
  • Krishnan aims to ensure continued American leadership in AI and coordinate AI policy across the government.
  • His appointment has been positively received by the Indian American community.
